005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
009
010import java.net.URI;
011
012import javax.xml.XMLConstants;
013
014import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
015
016/**
017 * Provides constant values used in Metapath.
018 */
019@SuppressWarnings("PMD.DataClass")
020public final class MetapathConstants {
021  @NonNull
022  public static final URI NS_METAPATH = ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(
023      URI.create("http://csrc.nist.gov/ns/metaschema/metapath"));
024  @NonNull
025  public static final URI NS_XML_SCHEMA = ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(
026      URI.create(XMLConstants.W3C_XML_SCHEMA_NS_URI));
027  @NonNull
028  public static final URI NS_METAPATH_FUNCTIONS = ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(
029      URI.create("http://csrc.nist.gov/ns/metaschema/metapath-functions"));
030  @NonNull
031  public static final URI NS_METAPATH_FUNCTIONS_MATH = ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(
032      URI.create(NS_METAPATH_FUNCTIONS + "/math"));
033  @NonNull
034  public static final URI NS_METAPATH_FUNCTIONS_ARRAY = ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(
035      URI.create(NS_METAPATH_FUNCTIONS + "/array"));
036  @NonNull
037  public static final URI NS_METAPATH_FUNCTIONS_MAP = ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(
038      URI.create(NS_METAPATH_FUNCTIONS + "/map"));
039  @NonNull
040  public static final URI NS_METAPATH_FUNCTIONS_EXTENDED = NS_METAPATH_FUNCTIONS;
041
042  @NonNull
043  public static final String PREFIX_METAPATH = "meta";
044  @NonNull
045  public static final String PREFIX_XML_SCHEMA = "xs";
046  @NonNull
047  public static final String PREFIX_XPATH_FUNCTIONS = "mp";
048  @NonNull
049  public static final String PREFIX_XPATH_FUNCTIONS_MATH = "math";
050  @NonNull
051  public static final String PREFIX_XPATH_FUNCTIONS_ARRAY = "array";
052  @NonNull
053  public static final String PREFIX_XPATH_FUNCTIONS_MAP = "map";
054
055  private MetapathConstants() {
056    // disable construction
057  }
058}
